ResearchProjectDef.label: 20mm Flak 38
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 20mm autocannon based on 20mm Flak 38 AA gun. Uses a 20 round magazine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 37mm Flak M42
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 37mm autocannon based on 37mm Flak M42 AA gun. Uses a belt-feed system with maximum 300 rounds of ammunition.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 40mm Bofors M1
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 40mm autocannon based on M1 Bofors AA gun. Needs a 4x40mm Ammo Clip and has a storage of about 20 clips.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned large autocannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to research and build the unmanned variant of large autocannons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned 20mm Flak 38
ResearchProjectDef.description: An unmanned version of 20mm Flak 38 Turret which has a reduced max range and reduced accuracy.
